name: Valhundra
description:
Valhundra is a platformer where enemies appear in waves. 

Play as a Viking and defend the entrance to the Vahalla. Equip yourself, use powerful spells and bonuses to defeat trolls, demonic horses and more. Repel the invasion!

There will be :

  • 14 ennemis
  • 12 spells & 3 bonus
  • 5 quality of items
  • 50 levels in total 

There is also a tutorial, a settings manager and a music manager ingame !
